name: Soft Ball
description:
I've always wanted to make a soft-body simulation. Here it is! Have fun playing around with this ball made of springs, lots of springs.

For now it's just a sandbox game, but if you like it I might design levels. Just leave a comment if you want me to improve the game.

Download the game to avoid the loading time, have better shadows and lights, and probably better performance too.

Most of the sound effects are mouth sounds. The teleport is made with bfxr.

3D assets are made with Blender. I used a few assets from Unity's Standard Assets too.

Music by LEMMiNO

https://soundcloud.com/lemmino/
